summary.name: Warner Music Group
summary.description: Established in 1958 by Jack L. Warner under Warner Bros. Studio, Warner Music Group is an entertainment and record congolmerate based in New York City with over 5,500 employees in over 50 countries. Handling every aspect of the music industry, WMG houses all means from talent acqusition to product distribution. It's most popular subsidaries are Warner Records, Elektra Records, Atlantic Records, Fueled By Ramaen, Songkick, and Alternative Distribution Alliance.

overview.name: Warner/Chappell Headquarters
overview.description: New headquarters for the music publishing arm of Warner Music Group. Splitting headquarters between NYC and LA places WMG's west coast operations under one roof, providing easier access between the distinctive cultures of the various labels and businesses to collaborate through state-of-the-art recording studios, artist lounges, and custom-designed offices with a central gathering hub equipped with co-working areas and a live performance space.

location.address: 777 S Santa Fe Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90021

overview.name: Warner Music International Services Limited
overview.description: A consolidation of half of WMG's London operations to streamline the record labels, publishing arm, marketing, legal and bussiness affairs, finance, and comercial offices for both the UK and internationally allong with ADA UK's headquarters for distrubution and talent aquisition. Along with Warner/Chappell Headquarters, Warner Music International Services' arcetecture support co-working, live performance spaces, and artist lounges in addition to it's offices.

overview.name: Warner Music Group Headquarters
overview.description: Houses the corperate offices for all WMG operations including recording, legal and business affairs, publishing, marketing, and finance offices.

overview.name: Nashville City Center
overview.description: Houses the main U.S. Shared Services organization Audit, Finance, Legal, Licensing, and Reporting offices. Supports all WMG record labels, Warner/Chappell Music Publishing, WEA Corp, and Alternative Distribution Alliance as well as WMG's other U.S. businesses.

overview.name: Warner Connect Offices
overview.description: Focusing on fan-first creative marketing and analytics, Warner Connect supports WMG's global marketing offices through studying social media trends dictating growth of new freelance artists, writers, and prodcuers then applying them to their current roster.

overview.name: Malaysia Artist Services
overview.description: Houses marketing & promotional activities for international artists across all key repertoire owners from US, UK & Europe including the following labels, Atlantic Records, Warner Records, Elektra, WMUK, and ADA. Specifically focusing on the digital landscape and it's nuances in Malaysia and how they can use that to grow artists' markets.

overview.name: IMGN Media Offices
overview.description: A tech-driven media production organization that createts social content for Gen Z audiences. Along with WMG, IMGN provides media for brand in all aspects of entertainment reaching over 50 million followers.

overview.name: Warner Music Australia
overview.description: Warner Music Australia oversees distrubution to New Zealand and Australia as well as local talent aquisition and label management.

overview.name: Sodatone
overview.description: A WMG acquisition for large-scale analytics engine. Houses offices for algorithmically searching fro undiscovered artists through data analytics with predictive inteligence. Sodatone helps the music industry find the best undiscovered artists through data analytics and predictive intelligence. They collaborate with A&R teams with all WMG label and publishers including their in-house label.
